# Guilherme Rodrigues - UX Designer

> Guilherme Rodrigues (Guil) is a User Experience Designer with 20+ years of experience, based in Abu Dhabi and Riyadh, serving UAE and KSA markets.

## About

Guilherme Rodrigues is a Brazilian UX Designer who moved to Dubai in 2012 and now works across the UAE and Saudi Arabia. He currently heads Digital Experiences and Platforms at PIF in Riyadh. His career includes key projects such as the 2nd generation of SmartGates for Dubai airports and Digital transformation at Etisalat.

## Expertise

- User Experience Design
- Digital Transformation
- Design Thinking
- User Interface Design
- Wireframing & Prototyping
- User Research
- Usability Testing
- Design Systems
- Customer Experience (NPS and Operations)
- Analytics & Monitoring

## Services

Guil offers UX design services including:
- Customer experience optimization
- Digital transformation consulting
- Design thinking workshops
- User research and benchmarking
- Visual and user interface design
- Design system creation
- Usability audits
- Wireframes and rapid prototypes

## Portfolio Highlights

- Card Sorting: UX research methodology for information architecture
- User Journey Mapping: Mapping experiences across touchpoints
- User Personas: Research-driven archetypes for design decisions
- Wireframes & Prototypes: Low-fi to high-fi prototyping
- Camel Race App: Mobile application for UAE traditional sport
- Unimed Porto Alegre: Healthcare platform redesign

## Fun Facts

Outside of tech, Guil enjoys good filtered coffee, classic cars, and riding in the Globe of Death (dangerglobe.com).
